description: Ministry of City Planning and Water Supply - Orders made to approve the acquisitions of Lands in Weliwita, Kaduwela D/S Division, Colombo District  for the Constructions under Weliwita Water Supply Scheme and in Tennekumbura and Semaneriyawatta, Kandy Four Gravets & Gangawata Korale D/S Division,  Kandy District for the Construction of Service reservoir and the access road to Service reservoir under Kundasale - Haragama Water Supply Progect
